articles.description: At 63 years old, Ernie Dingo says racial slurs are something he has been dealing with his whole life, but being abused yet again at a Perth train station on Wednesday was the last straw.
articles.content:
He said the media was careful not to offend people with disabilities but had no issue with spelling out racist slurs about Aboriginal people, saying "that's the word that ticked me off."
"The thing … [+1703 chars]
